text: Manuel Marín González (21 October 1949 – 4 December 2017) was a Spanish politician. He was a former President of the Congress of Deputies. He was a long-time member of the European Commission, and acting President during the Santer Commission following the resignation of the Jacques Santer. Marín died in Madrid on 4 December 2017 at the age of 68 from lung cancer. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Presidents of the Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:European Commissioners
title: Manuel Marín
